free.question: Is GANGIO free to use?
free.answer: Yes, GANGIO is completely free to download and use. We offer premium subscriptions with extra features, but the core functionality is free forever.

multipleDevices.question: Can I use GANGIO on multiple devices?
multipleDevices.answer: Absolutely! Your account syncs across all platforms, allowing smooth switching between desktop, mobile, and web versions.

security.question: How secure is GANGIO?
security.answer: We use industry-standard encryption and security practices to keep your data safe. Your privacy is our priority.

updates.question: How do I update GANGIO?
updates.answer: The app checks for updates automatically on startup. You can also check manually in the settings menu.
